title: Pixel 3XL and Android 10 Problems
content:
Since I updated my Pixel 3XL to Android 10, I have two major problems: 
1.) I cannot change the ringtone; I can select and test a ringtone, but the phone keeps ringing with a very bad default tone. 
2.) I cannot see my Garmin Chronos as connected Bluetooth device (I need that for smartlock) desite the device is successfully paired and connected.
I already did a factory reset, with no success.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
